definition.text: A point is a definition of an [x,y] coordinate. The value [x] usually represents a datetime. The value [y] may refer to a price or some other concept.

translations.text: Точка - это определение координаты [x,y]. Значение [x] обычно представляет дату и время. Значение [y] может относиться к цене или какой-либо другой концепции.

paragraphs.text: These coordinate points are used to define polygons. Values for [x,y]coordinates are entered with a point formula.
Give points a significant name so that it is easier to identify them at the time of establishing references with polygon vertices.
